What a fantastic idea! Including Premier League or European football questions will definitely add an extra layer of excitement for fans like yourself, and it's a great way to cater to a diverse group of sports enthusiasts.

Here are some sample questions to get you started:

**Premier League Trivia:**

1. Which team has won the most Premier League titles?
a) Manchester United
b) Liverpool
c) Arsenal
d) Chelsea

2. Who is the all-time leading scorer in the Premier League?
a) Alan Shearer
b) Wayne Rooney
c) Thierry Henry
d) Harry Kane

3. Which manager has won the most Premier League titles?
a) Sir Alex Ferguson
b) Pep Guardiola
c) José Mourinho
d) Arsène Wenger

**European Football Trivia:**

1. Which team has won the most UEFA Champions League titles?
a) Real Madrid
b) AC Milan
c) Liverpool
d) Bayern Munich

2. Who is the all-time leading scorer in the UEFA Champions League?
a) Cristiano Ronaldo
b) Lionel Messi
c) Robert Lewandowski
d) Karim Benzema

3. Which player has won the most Ballon d'Or awards?
a) Lionel Messi
b) Cristiano Ronaldo
c) Zinedine Zidane
d) Kaka

These questions should give you a good starting point. You can also consider including questions about specific teams, players, or memorable matches to make it more engaging for Premier League and European football fans.

Remember to balance the questions with the other sports-related trivia to ensure everyone has a chance to participate and enjoy the game. And, of course, feel free to add more Manchester City-specific questions to make it a fun and personalized experience for you and your fellow City fans!
